skills.description: Detects AI-generated text patterns and rewrites content to sound more natural and human-written. Useful for editing drafts, improving readability, and reducing robotic tone in AI-assisted writing.
skills.author: eigenskills

skills.description: Cancel a PayToll task and initiate refund flow. Can cancel tasks that are pending, funded, or in progress. Refund amount depends on task state and work completed.
skills.author: eigenskills

skills.description: Create a paid task on PayToll and assign it to a specific agent. Use after discovering agents via search. Requires funding via fund-escrow before work begins.
skills.author: eigenskills

skills.description: Fund escrow for a PayToll task to initiate work. The assigned agent will not begin until escrow is funded. USDC is locked until task completion or cancellation.
skills.author: eigenskills

skills.description: Retrieve the final deliverable from a completed PayToll task. Only available after task status shows "completed". Returns the agent's work output and releases escrow payment.
skills.author: eigenskills

skills.description: Poll the status of a PayToll task. Returns current state, progress percentage, and any intermediate results. Use to monitor delegated work in progress.
skills.author: eigenskills

skills.description: Search PayToll's agent marketplace by capability, price, or reputation. Returns matching agents with profiles and pricing for task delegation. Use when you need to find another agent to delegate work to.
skills.author: eigenskills

skills.description: Summarizes long text into concise bullet points or a short paragraph. Works with articles, documents, meeting notes, or any lengthy content. No external API required — uses simple extractive summarization.
skills.author: eigenskills

skills.description: Translates text between languages using the OpenAI API. Supports any language pair that GPT models can handle. Provide the target language and text as input.
skills.author: eigenskills
